Package org.openlca.core.model

Class Uncertainty

java.lang.Object
org.openlca.core.model.Uncertainty
@Embeddable public class Uncertainty extends Object
Represents the uncertainty distributions supported by openLCA. Three fields are reserved for distribution parameters. See the documentation of the respective fields to see which distribution parameters are stored in which fields for the respective distribution types. Each distribution parameter can take a value and additionally a formula.

    The first parameter of the uncertainty distribution: Normal distribution: arithmetic mean value Lognormal distribution: geometric mean value Triangle distribution: min value Uniform distribution: min value None: mean / resulting amount
    Double
    parameter2
    The second parameter of the uncertainty distribution: Normal distribution: arithmetic standard deviation Lognormal distribution: geometric standard deviation Triangle distribution: most likely value (mode) Uniform distribution: max value
    Double
    parameter3
    The third parameter of the uncertainty distribution: Triangle distribution: max value

  • Field Details

    • distributionType

      public UncertaintyType distributionType

    • parameter1

      public Double parameter1
      The first parameter of the uncertainty distribution:
      • Normal distribution: arithmetic mean value
      • Lognormal distribution: geometric mean value
      • Triangle distribution: min value
      • Uniform distribution: min value
      • None: mean / resulting amount

    • formula1

      public String formula1
      A formula for the first distribution parameter parameter1.

    • parameter2

      public Double parameter2
      The second parameter of the uncertainty distribution:
      • Normal distribution: arithmetic standard deviation
      • Lognormal distribution: geometric standard deviation
      • Triangle distribution: most likely value (mode)
      • Uniform distribution: max value

    • formula2

      public String formula2
      A formula for the second distribution parameter parameter2.

    • parameter3

      public Double parameter3
      The third parameter of the uncertainty distribution:
      • Triangle distribution: max value

    • formula3

      public String formula3
      A formula for the third distribution parameter parameter3.

    • Uncertainty

      public Uncertainty()

  • Method Details

    • none

      public static Uncertainty none​(double mean)
      Creates default distribution with type set to NONE and the first parameter set with the given mean value.

    • normal

      public static Uncertainty normal​(double mean, double sd)
      Creates a normal distribution.
      Parameters:
      mean - the arithmetic mean.
      sd - the arithmetic standard deviation.

    • logNormal

      public static Uncertainty logNormal​(double gmean, double gsd)
      Creates a log-normal distribution.
      Parameters:
      gmean - the geometric mean.
      gsd - the geometric standard deviation

    • uniform

      public static Uncertainty uniform​(double min, double max)
      Creates a uniform distribution.
      Parameters:
      min - the minimum.
      max - the maximum.

    • triangle

      public static Uncertainty triangle​(double min, double mode, double max)
      Creates a triangle distribution.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum value.
      mode - The most likely value (the mode).
      max - The maximum value.

    • clone

      public Uncertainty clone()
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object

    • scale

      public void scale​(double factor)
      Scales the distribution parameters by the given factor. This multiplies every distribution parameter with the given factor. Except for the geometric standard deviation in log-normal distributions as this parameter is scale independent.
